subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Ottawa Senators, the Montreal Canadiens, the Calgary Flames, the Vancouver Canucks and the Winnipeg Jets give Canada the most teams it has had in the playoffs since 2004.
snippet: The Ottawa Senators, the Montreal Canadiens, the Calgary Flames, the Vancouver Canucks and the Winnipeg Jets give Canada the most teams it has had in the playoffs since 2004.
